com.strath.hub
Class BluetoothLinkService

java.lang.Object
  com.strath.hub.BluetoothLinkService

public class BluetoothLinkService
extends java.lang.Object

Set up and manage Bluetooth connections. Use separate threads to connect to devices, and, when connected, to receive data.
